text: Anthurium subcoerulescens is a species of plant in the family Araceae endemic to Ecuador but threatened by habitat loss. Its natural habitats are subtropical or tropical moist lowland forests and subtropical or tropical moist montane forests. ==References== subcoerulescens Category:Endemic flora of Ecuador Category:Vulnerable plants Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Anthurium subcoerulescens
